originalText.text:
Overpriced and rude. I
A bottle of wine I really like that I buy everywhere for a certain price, they have it 20% higher than anywhere else I've been. Quite a few of their items are Overpriced

originalText.text: Waited nearly 3 hours for a delivery.  Two phone calls and a support call to Delivery.com later and the wrong bottle was delivered.  When notified,  the store claimed the size was right and the receipt was wrong.  They offered to deliver what I'd ordered,  but for an additional cost.  Will order from anywhere else in the future.

When notified,  the store claimed the size was right and the receipt was wrong.  They offered to deliver what I'd ordered,  but for an additional cost.  Will order from anywhere else in the future.

originalText.text:
I've been going here for quite some time and easily spent thousands of dollars over the years!! I've spent a LOT of money here because I was trying to support "my people." I was informed that it's black and Jamaican owned and it's in my
community so why not?! Depending on who I get, the service can be terrible and they WILL try and rip you off; especially the mixed Asian woman. Everytime I deal with her, she short changes me and tries to avoid giving me my receipt. Today she charged me over $4 extra unnecessarily and tried to have me leave without getting my receipt. I had to wait until they tried to "fix" the machine and then she said the receipt was there the entire time. I got my money back thankfully but what about the other times i may have missed it by not paying attention? I've left without receipt already not knowing this was their practice.  I truly hope the owner or some form of management who has power sees this because you just lost a loyal customer. Pay attention customers because they will rip you off if you allow it! This is terrible! They should not try to rip off the folks in the community who are keeping them in business. Utterly disgusting!

originalText.text: Not that these people care about customer service or negative reviews, but I just had to share my experience with the world.  I ordered from this store, it was a $50 order in which I was paying a $5 delivery fee, plus a $2 service fee plus tax and tip. They kept my order on hold for 90 minutes because they were out of the item I ordered and were trying to sell me other things, when I agreed to an alternative, 2 minutes later I was told they were out of that and then were sending something else that I didnt really want, when I told the clerk that I wasnt thrilled, but I still wanted my order, instead of trying to make his customer happy, he instead chose to cancel my order.  Just the rudest most disgusting behavior I have ever seen.  I will never order again and I hope you do not either.  do Not give your money to these people.

Just the rudest most disgusting behavior I have ever seen.  I will never order again and I hope you do not either.  do Not give your money to these people.

originalText.text: Never order Drizzly or any delivery from here. Poor customer service and unprofessional. They brought the wrong bottle, and called immediately to let them know. They told me they would send the correct one right away. I waited for an hr, then called again, was told it would be delivered soon. 3hrs and 7 phone calls later they ask if I’m sure the right bottle hasn’t been delivered, doubting the fact that I would be calling if it were corrected. I then had to wait 2 days to coordinate another delivery, all to tell me that they had run out of the size I originally ordered. Quite a disappointing and awful experience that was a waste of time.
